alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; East Carroll; Franklin; Madison; Richland; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued February 17 at 1:52PM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 20 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA EAST CARROLL FRANKLIN MADISON RICHLAND TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 27 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW COPIAH HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON YAZOO IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA LEFLORE MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI SUNFLOWER IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, ANGUILLA, BELZONI, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BUDE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DELHI, DURANT, EUPORA, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, FOREST, GOODMAN, GREENWOOD, GRENADA, HARRISONBURG, HAZLEHURST, INDIANOLA, ISOLA, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, KOSCIUSKO, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LEXINGTON, MADISON, MAGEE, MATHISTON, MAYERSVILLE, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MONTICELLO, MORTON, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, PEARL, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RAYVILLE, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, ROXIE, RULEVILLE, ST. JOSEPH, TALLULAH, TCHULA, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WINNSBORO, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
